data.name: MARVEL Puzzle Quest
data.detailed_description:
MARVEL Puzzle Quest is the ultimate Match 3 Super Hero RPG experience! Collect and level up your favorite characters to discover incredible strategic depth like no other Match-3 has to offer! Become a puzzle combat master as you learn to harness superpowers to bend the gem board to your will. Start your journey to defeat super-powerful cosmic threats to save the universe!

Join over 40 million players in deep strategic puzzle combat. Recruit 375+ Super Heroes and Super Villains from across the Marvel Universe, master unique superpowers, and harness the ultimate power of the new 6-Star tier!

  • COLLECT + UNLOCK YOUR FAVORITE MARVEL HEROES - Complete your comic collection and forge an unstoppable team

  • UPGRADE + MAXIMIZE YOUR TEAM'S POWER - Continuously level up your roster to take on bigger challenges

  • FIGHT IN A TACTICAL MATCH-3 BATTLEFIELD - Every move is a tactical decision in this action packed match-3 combat system.

  • MASTER HEAD-TO-HEAD PVP + ENDLESS CHALLENGES - Take part in constant, high-stakes events throughout the year.

Assemble your legendary Super Hero roster and master the gem board! Harness iconic Marvel powers and outwit foes in engaging, tactical, puzzle combat

COLLECT + UNLOCK YOUR FAVORITE MARVEL HEROES

Complete your comic collection and forge an unstoppable team with characters and artwork pulled directly from Marvel Comics history.

  • Recruit 375+ Heroes: Collect original Marvel Comic Covers to instantly unlock and recruit icons like Spider-Man, Captain America, and Doctor Doom.

  • Build Your Ultimate Roster: Collect heroes and villains from across the Marvel Universe, from street-level Wolverine to the cosmic threat of Thanos.

UPGRADE + MAXIMIZE YOUR TEAM'S POWER

Continuously level up your roster to take on bigger challenges.

  • Make Your Heroes Stronger: Use collected Covers to level up and improve your favorite characters. Every new Cover you add increases their unique Powers, turning a starting hero into a true powerhouse!

  • Master the Strategy: Focus on the strategic pairing of heroes and chase Covers for the latest and rarest 5-Star characters and beyond. Unlock their full potential and dominate your opponents across the game's many modes.

FIGHT IN A TACTICAL MATCH-3 BATTLEFIELD

The board is your battlefield. Every move is a tactical decision in this action packed match-3 combat system.

  • Unleash Superpowers: Match 3 or more gems to generate Attack Power and fuel your hero’s unique abilities. Deploy powerful skills to deal massive damage or manipulate the board in your favor.

  • Strategic Depth: This is far beyond simple matching. Master team synergies and tactical planning to secure victory.

MASTER HEAD-TO-HEAD PVP & ENDLESS CHALLENGES

Take your newly assembled Marvel dream team and prove their strength by taking part in constant, high-stakes events throughout the year.

  • Climb the Leaderboards: Battle friends and rivals in seasonal tournaments. Dominate in the newly re-scaled S.H.I.E.L.D. Clearance Levels (SCL), with competitive top tiers designed to test even the strongest teams.

  • New Content Daily: Take on ‘Deadpool’s Daily Challenge’ and many other limited-time story events for epic rewards. New characters, costumes, and major updates are added constantly.

START YOUR MARVEL MATCH-3 RPG ADVENTURE TODAY!

There’s no time to waste—install now to unleash your inner super hero and save the day!

data.short_description: Collect Marvel characters and upgrade your unstoppable squad in this epic Super Hero Puzzle RPG! Fight on the tactical Match-3 board where every move is crucial, and master head-to-head PvP tournaments alongside high-stakes events all year round!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“An intricately crafted, remarkably deep experience – Marvel Puzzle Quest doesn’t merely meet the expectations of its name, it exceeds them.”
9.1 out of 10 –

“Even for those unfamiliar with the ever-expanding Marvel universe, Dark Reign’s use of collection and randomized drops make it compulsively, sickeningly playable.”
4 out of 5 –

“Marvel Puzzle Quest Might Just Be My Forever Game”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.00GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 / Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
